user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (hr@globaldynamics.com) discussing John Smith'"'"'s candidacy, and remind her to review her Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Details on John Smith’s Candidacy

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please email me (hr@globaldynamics.com) with your thoughts and any relevant details regarding John Smith’s suitability for the role at Tech Innovations?

When you have a moment, kindly review your Gmail and Notion to gather any supporting information before sending your response.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
HR Department  
Global Dynamics

final_output:
